duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect and maintain the community, including grounds and amenities, to ensure cleanliness and neatness
Remove litter, debris, and pet droppings from common areas and amenities throughout the day
Complete minor service requests and assist in the turn process of vacant apartments
Change locks and ensure safety compliance for pool areas
Distribute notices and communications to residents as required
Demonstrate customer service skills and respond to maintenance service complaints
Comply with safety and risk-management policies and attend routine safety meetings

education_certification.credential: Valid driver’s license (to operate a golf cart on the property)
